rooms.description: Open-plan living area connected to the kitchen, large windows facing north-east for Vastu alignment.
Scandinavian style kitchen integrated with living area; features minimalistic design and energy-efficient appliances.
Open-plan dining space adjacent to the living room, promoting family gatherings.
Dedicated home theater area with acoustic design and strategic seating arrangement, located in a quiet corner for immersive viewing experience.
Guest bedroom designed for privacy and comfort; features subtle Scandinavian decor.
Quarters for domestic staff with functional layout and access to shared bathroom facilities.
Central hallway connecting all key areas; designed to promote natural light entry from strategically placed windows.

openings.description: Main entrance following Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large window to enhance natural light and maintain Scandinavian aesthetic.
